name: Joe Block 2: Into the metaverse
description: In this game you traverse the metaverse and endulge in the meme quantum realm. You will experience every emotion while playing this game.  admiration, adoration, appreciation of beauty, amusement, anger, anxiety, awe, awkwardness, boredom, calmness, confusion, craving, disgust, empathic pain, entrancement, excitement, fear, horror, interest, joy, nostalgia, relief.
